item.title: Video Shorts Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello everyone, I am looking for a talented, hard-working video editor who can align his/her visions with mine. I am looking to spread positive, deep, truthful messages to the world via YouTube Shorts and I will need a editor to edit roughly 30seconds-1.15min videos of them suitable for YouTube Short. In a month we will aim to make 15 videos to start off and the monthly budget is $75 starting off. This will be a consistent and long-term position which may go on for years - I am looking for 1 dedicated person for this and I know the pay is not too great but I can only offer something reasonable for me right now but as we grow the compensation will as well.

Edited video samples: https://www.instagram.com/reel/CycRYgYNuF2/?igshid=b3A1ZTJqd2dzYzM2
https://www.instagram.com/reel/CzCSQ3HP9qK/?igshid=MWQ5NGx0a2pmb2Z3aA==
https://www.instagram.com/reel/CxvfrD4uYny/?igshid=b3lnZzNjY3phd2ps
https://youtube.com/shorts/--PgU4L92rg?si=ntatvcOfvbGRQLEg

The videos we are looking to make are deep and poetic like Rumi, or Khalil Gibran type of vibes. We are looking to spread truth. Video editor needs to have same hunger of speaking Truth as the Sufi Poets to do this with us. Looking forward to hearing some applications, thank you.

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 17, 2024 05:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Dialogue Editing, Audio Editing, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Instrumental Music
Skills: Dialogue Editing, Audio Editing, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Instrumental Music
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Manager/Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to run my social media accounts. This entails uploading and scheduling videos to multiple platforms, titling and adding descriptions to videos, writing and scheduling posts, community interaction, strategy and more.

You need to be able to take already edited videos and make adjustments for different formats and call to actions on different platforms.

This is for a small gaming YouTube channel looking to grow and also have a presence on other platforms. This channel streams content, and edited videos are made from the stream primarily.


Posted On: June 17, 2024 04:56 UTC
Category: Community Management
Skills:Content Creation, Content Writing, Social Media Management, Video Editing & Production, Photo Editing, Photo Editing Software, Social Media Content

item.title: On-Going Video Editor Needed for Short Social Media Videos (Less than 1 Min per video) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello we are looking for a video editor for on-going work editing videos for our social media marketing efforts. These videos will be used primarily on Instagram Reels & TikTok - so please be familiar with how these platforms work and showcase you have done work like this before.

This is a full-time position, and would require you to work on EST between the hours of 9am-5pm. If you are ok with this please include the phrase "time33" in your cover letter. We will ignore any applicants that don't provide this phrase.

Some tasks you will be asked to do:

- Match video with music beat.
-Add Captions that stand out and follow the voiceover of the video.
- A lot of caption work (please show videos where you have edited the captions to stand out)
- Cutting and editing footage
- Remove pauses/breathes from audio. Change speed and or tone of audio.
- Adding Text-to-speech from TikTok app to video
- Importing/Export Video from TikTok to Video Editor of choice

𝐐𝐮𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬:
Please show proof of previous work on social media platforms
1-2+ years of experience with TikTok video editor
1-2+ years of experience with Adobe Premier or Final Cut Pro or something similar.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 04:55 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, TikTok, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, TikTok, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Content and Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
About Net Positive:
Net Positive is a sustainable underwear brand dedicated to creating high-quality, eco-friendly products that prioritize comfort and style. Our mission is to make a positive impact on the environment and our customers' lives through sustainable practices and non-toxic fabrics.

Job Description:
We are seeking a creative and passionate Social Media Content and Video Creator to join our marketing team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of social media platforms, excellent storytelling skills, and the ability to create engaging and visually appealing content that resonates with our target audience.

Responsibilities:
-Develop and execute creative content strategies for various social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, etc.) to increase brand awareness and engagement.
-Create high-quality, visually appealing, and on-brand photos and videos that showcase our products, values, and lifestyle.
-Plan, film, and edit video content for social media, including product demos, behind-the-scenes, customer stories, and brand campaigns.
-Collaborate with the marketing team to brainstorm and develop content ideas that align with our brand voice and goals.

Qualifications:
-Proven experience as a Social Media Content Creator, Video Creator, or similar role.
-Strong portfolio showcasing a range of content creation skills, including photography, videography, and editing.
-Proficiency in using social media platforms, content management tools, and video editing software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, Final Cut Pro, Canva).
-Excellent visual storytelling and creative thinking abilities.
-Strong understanding of social media trends, algorithms, and best practices.
-Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
-Passion for sustainability and eco-friendly practices is a plus.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume, portfolio, and a brief note explaining why they would be a great fit for Net Positive. Please include links to your social media profiles and any relevant work samples.

Hourly Range: $9.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 04:49 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Advertising, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Instagram, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Content Creation, Video Production, Facebook
Skills: Social Media Advertising, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Instagram, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Content Creation, Video Production, Facebook
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
Hi there,

We are looking for a video editor who can create videos this quality: https://youtu.be/6rGjiz9wtZY?si=j-oPWqpo6JOwb1AU

Notice the effects, overlays, text, transitions, and overall professional feel. We are looking for someone who has experience editing this exact style.

Our videos will be around 30 minutes in length.

Currently building out the team, and will likely need several editors. Looking for people with exact experience in this niche.

item.title: Reels Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled reels editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for editing reels at the rate of $15 for every 3 reels, with the possibility of working on one reel a day or more. As a reels editor, you will have a keen eye for detail and be able to bring out the best in each reel. Your responsibilities will include reviewing footage, selecting the best shots, and creating cohesive and engaging reels that showcase our clients' work. We are looking for someone who is proficient with video editing software and has a strong understanding of storytelling and pacing. If you are passionate about creating visually compelling reels, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $160
Posted On: June 17, 2024 04:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Photoshop

item.title: Video Editor for Compilation Videos with Creative Elements - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create compilation videos from existing footage. The ideal candidate will have a strong creative flair and attention to detail. You will add laugh tracks, emojis, and other funny elements (as directed or using your judgment) to make the videos engaging and entertaining. The videos will be used for social media platforms and require a quick turnaround time.
**This will likely be a long-term job and should only require a few hours a week to complete.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Creative thinking and ability to add funny elements
- Attention to detail and ability to maintain consistent quality
- Strong storytelling and narrative skills

This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate video editor who has prior experience in creating compilation videos.

Hourly Range: $6.00-$11.00
Posted On: June 17, 2024 04:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Job details:
Niche: Health & Nutrition
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 13-18 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-48 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video

Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.

We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the Health & Nutrition niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): Health & Nutrition STORIES/FACTS

The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks

Here is an example of the quality of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/fx0kIEOL59Q?si=bO8SEpiHV6-F4-0V

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to Storyblocks or similar for stock images and clips.
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)

Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].

Start your bid with “strawberrylemonade”, so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 17, 2024 04:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Country: United States
click to apply
